Text.Page:
Take a good look. Drink it in. You stand before the most influential person you will ever meet.

Well, I will be as soon as my goods arrive. Stupid carriage is three days late! If I go check on it, it will show up as soon as I leave. It's always the way.

Can you go find it? I am willing to part with some money if that'd help.

(This carriage is destroyed. Supplies and merchants' goods lie scattered everywhere. Everything of value is already gone.

It was most likely attacked by {@LinkCreature:18#3#Desert Fire ragers}s. They probably have the missing goods.)

Oh no! So much money dissolved into the sand....

Well, thank you for what you were able to bring back.
Keep an eye on those Desert Fire {@LinkCreature:18#2#shamans} and {@LinkCreature:18#3#ragers}!
